thread.title: Man Sings In Shipping Container And It Is Unexpectedly Beautiful

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Man Sings In Shipping Container And It Is Unexpectedly Beautiful
text:
Man Sings In Shipping Container And It Is Unexpectedly Beautiful Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
David Jeremiah recently bought a shipping container for storage. While checking it out, he seemed more impressed by the containers acoustics than its space. 
He decided to take advantage of the echo and sing ‘Ave Maria’– the end result being an unexpectedly beautiful performance in the most unexpected of places! Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
